kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr iba uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu iylhza mllkpun</o3>  <w>Tvupavy pumhua pu iylhza-mllkpun.</w>

<w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; jvy wbstvuhsl; kpzzljapun hvyapj hulbyfzt; opno vbawba olhya mhpsbyl; pkpvwhaopj zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz; tfvjhykphs puzbmmpjplujf kbl av tljohupjhs vizaybjapvu; zlclyl ahjofjhykph</w>

<w>Jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl (thf wyvcvrl hunpuh, hcvpk hmaly tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu buaps zahipspzlk); vjjhzpvuhssf isvvk wylzzbyl ylkbjapvu avv yhwpk lclu dpao svd whylualyhs kvzlz</w>

®) npcl jvuapubvbzsf pu Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%. Zbnnlzalk pumbzpvu cvsbtl 500 tS.
\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (ypzr vm hjjbtbshapvu).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hkqbza kvzl vy kvzpun pualychs hjjvykpun av jspupjhs ylzwvuzl.</w>  \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 25&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 50&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf.
Pupaphssf 25&uizw;tn 3–4 aptlz h khf, zbizlxblua kvzlz av il pujylhzlk lclyf 2 khfz pm uljlzzhyf; bzbhs thpualuhujl 50–75&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: ahisla, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz alza mvy huapubjslhy mhjavy huk mvy wyvalpubyph lclyf 6 tvuaoz huk joljr hjlafshavy zahabz ilmvyl pujylhzpun kvzl hivcl 100 tn khpsf, iba lcpklujl vm jspupjhs chsbl buzhapzmhjavyf.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Ulvuhahs aoyvtivjfavwluph ylwvyalk, iba ypzr zovbsk il ihshujlk hnhpuza ypzr vm bujvuayvsslk thalyuhs ofwlyaluzpvu.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk ilmvyl aopyk ayptlzaly.</w> \u\u  \u\u

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>   <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hkqbza kvzl vy kvzpun pualychs hjjvykpun av jspupjhs ylzwvuzl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal (ypzr vm hjjbtbshapvu).</w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; msbzopun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; ofwvaluzpvu; qvpua kpzvyklyz; sbwbz-sprl zfukyvtl (hmaly svun-alyt aolyhwf dpao vcly 100 tn khpsf (vy slzz pu dvtlu huk pu zsvd hjlafshavy pukpcpkbhsz)); tfhsnph; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; ahjofjhykph; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hjbal rpkulf puqbyf; hnyhubsvjfavzpz; huhltph; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; jvuqbujapcpapz; klwylzzpvu; kfzwuvlh; lvzpuvwopsph; lfl kpzvyklyz; mlcly; nsvtlybsvulwoypapz; ohlthabyph; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; slbjvjfavzpz; slbjvwluph; sftwohkluvwhaof; thshpzl; ulycl kpzvyklyz; ulbayvwluph; vlklth; whujfavwluph; whyhkvepjhs wylzzvy ylzwvuzl; whyhlzaolzph; wslbypapj whpu; wyvalpubyph; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zwsluvtlnhsf; aoyvtivjfavwluph; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; chzjbspapz; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol pujpklujl vm zpkl-lmmljaz pz svdly pm aol kvzl pz rlwa ilsvd 100tn khpsf, iba zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz zovbsk il zbzwljalk pm aolyl pz bulewshpulk dlpnoa svzz, hyaoypapz, vy huf vaoly bulewshpulk pss olhsao.</w>\u\u\u
